caption.p: Example of a probabilistic interannual prediction for 5-year GMT anomalies using the transfer operators. Evolution of the predicted density distribution of GMT for hindcast lags of a 1 year, b 2 years, c 5 years, and d 10 years (red histogram). Vertical blue lines indicate the initial condition; the gray histograms in the background represent the asymptotic, climatological distribution; vertical black lines correspond to the mean, ±1, and ±2 standard deviations of the asymptotic, climatological distribution
